channel.title: [PI] Error: T2
channel.description:
Okay, so I am getting these T2 errors and not sure how to find the problem. It isn't severe, it doesn't cause any problems (that I can see) besides giving the error in the console, but I would rather not have that happen at all of course. :p
What I do know: - The error is given while opening up the bank, putting an item into the bank, and taking an item out of the bank. - I know somewhat of what the error is saying because of a post from Rune-server explaining how to read the T2 error, but it wasn't clear enough to know how to find the problem and where. And that is most likely all I need in order to fix the problem.
I will split the errors into 3 types, opening up the bank, inserting an item into the bank, and taking an item out of the bank.
Here is opening up the bank: [code] Error: T2 - 53,53,36 - 1540,3018,9740 - 21,6,1,-60,8,-1,60,5,32,71,17,46,71,2,48,71,4,50,71,4,52,71,4,54,71,-2,-103,2,-1,-8,127,102,-82,-99,36,-1,0,0,46,4,4,47,-1,0,0,24,4,1,47,-1, [/code]
Here is inserting an item into the bank: [code] Error: T2 - 53,53,36 - 1540,3018,9740 - 21,6,1,-60,8,-1,60,5,32,71,17,46,71,2,48,71,4,50,71,4,52,71,4,54,71,-2,-103,2,-1,-8,127,102,-82,-99,36,-1,0,0,46,4,4,47,-1,0,0,24,4,1,47,-1, Error: T2 - 53,53,53 - 1540,3018,9740 - 21,6,1,-60,8,-1,60,5,32,71,17,46,71,2,48,71,4,50,71,4,52,71,4,54,71,-2,-103,2,-1,-8,127,102,-82,-99,36,-1,0,0,46,4,4,47,-1,0,0,24,4,1,47,-1, [/code]
and.. Here is taking an item out of the bank: [code] Error: T2 - 53,53,126 - 1540,3018,9740 - 21,6,1,-60,8,-1,60,5,32,71,17,46,71,2,48,71,4,50,71,4,52,71,4,54,71,-2,-103,2,-1,-8,127,102,-82,-99,36,-1,0,0,46,4,4,47,-1,0,0,24,4,1,47,-1, Error: T2 - 53,53,36 - 1540,3018,9740 - 21,6,1,-60,8,-1,60,5,32,71,17,46,71,2,48,71,4,50,71,4,52,71,4,54,71,-2,-103,2,-1,-8,127,102,-82,-99,36,-1,0,0,46,4,4,47,-1,0,0,24,4,1,47,-1, [/code]
As you can see they are all pretty similar, but that is about all I am able to deduce. I have no idea what or where to check. :\ All help is greatly appreciated. Thank you.

item.title: [PI] Error: T2
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“enahsh2o, post:5, topic:529335”][quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=648090.msg4359384#msg4359384 date=1378400650]
have you attempted changing the bank size? I know a few bank errors were because of that.

(try 352)

if that doesn’t work let me know
[/quote]
Lol it worked. Thank you very much.
I wish errors like those were more clear, such a simple thing. Mine was 452 instead of 352 and it never crossed my mind that could be a problem.
Once again thank you.[/quote]glad I could be of service

I’ve had to fix that so many times (not to mention noobs have released fix before on rune-server)

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Error: T2
item.dc:creator: @enahsh2o enahsh2o
item.description:
@enahsh2o wrote:

Okay, so I am getting these T2 errors and not sure how to find the problem. It isn’t severe, it doesn’t cause any problems (that I can see) besides giving the error in the console, but I would rather not have that happen at all of course.

What I do know:

  • The error is given while opening up the bank, putting an item into the bank, and taking an item out of the bank.
  • I know somewhat of what the error is saying because of a post from Rune-server explaining how to read the T2 error, but it wasn’t clear
    enough to know how to find the problem and where. And that is most likely all I need in order to fix the problem.

I will split the errors into 3 types, opening up the bank, inserting an item into the bank, and taking an item out of the bank.

Here is opening up the bank:

Error: T2 - 53,53,36 - 1540,3018,9740 - 21,6,1,-60,8,-1,60,5,32,71,17,46,71,2,48,71,4,50,71,4,52,71,4,54,71,-2,-103,2,-1,-8,127,102,-82,-99,36,-1,0,0,46,4,4,47,-1,0,0,24,4,1,47,-1,

Here is inserting an item into the bank:

and…
Here is taking an item out of the bank:

Error: T2 - 53,53,126 - 1540,3018,9740 - 21,6,1,-60,8,-1,60,5,32,71,17,46,71,2,48,71,4,50,71,4,52,71,4,54,71,-2,-103,2,-1,-8,127,102,-82,-99,36,-1,0,0,46,4,4,47,-1,0,0,24,4,1,47,-1,

As you can see they are all pretty similar, but that is about all I am able to deduce. I have no idea what or where to check. :
All help is greatly appreciated. Thank you.
